plot: Two robbers get together to plan a bank robbery, but it seems one of the robbers is more busy with the holiday celebration than doing a heist. A short film about friendship, loneliness and finding the Christmas spirit.
title: Julebrekket
plot_es: Two robbers get together to plan a bank robbery, but it seems one of the robbers is more busy with the holiday celebration than doing a heist. A short film about friendship, loneliness and finding the Christmas spirit.
plot_en: Two robbers get together to plan a bank robbery, but it seems one of the robbers is more busy with the holiday celebration than doing a heist. A short film about friendship, loneliness and finding the Christmas spirit.
